Pittleman & Associates  Home About Us Our Team For Candidates For Employers Our Clients Corporations Law Firms Contact Us Careers at P&A Menu Street Address City, State, Zip Phone Number Your Custom Text Here For more than a quarter of a century, we have been placing the country’s most highly sought after attorneys with the most discerning employers. We take one of the most stressful processes in life and make it comfortable, efficient, even enjoyable, and most importantly, successful. Our record speaks for itself. Founded in a converted townhouse in historic Tudor City, we have grown to be the global resource for the Fortune 500, international law firms and top boutiques. Our Services Pittleman & Associates has been a leading attorney placement firm since 1985. We place attorneys in the most highly coveted jobs, not only in the most prestigious law firms, but also in Fortune 500 companies, private equity and hedge funds, investment banks, and management consulting firms, among others. Learn more about our superior client service → Learn more about our personalized candidate approach → “In this profession, a career change is very high stakes, and few grow up with the inside information necessary to navigate it successfully, so it is crucial to have highly experienced, knowledgeable, caring, professional counsel.” —Steve Pittleman, FOUNDER Because of our ability to create successful and long-lasting matches, our client list has grown over the years. It includes the full spectrum of outstanding law firms from the largest and most prestigious to distinctive boutiques. It also includes Fortune 500 corporations and start-ups bringing in their first counsel. Plus, major investment banks and consulting firms, which use attorneys in both legal and non-legal positions; as well as some non-traditional opportunities that utilize attorneys' experience and training. Law Firm Clients Corporation Clients "The quality of every attorney hire both reflects and impacts the quality of the entire law department - and the costs of a mistake or delay in hiring can be steep. With our extensive network built over decades, we can ensure that our clients have quick access to the finest candidates for each and every role." -Linda Pittleman, Founder Want to learn more about us? Introduce yourself → • EMAIL: JOBS@PITTLEMANASSOCIATES.COM •
